abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights game and news apps for Apple's new iPhone 6s and updated iOS 9 system for older phones and iPads.
lead_paragraph: Apps for the new devices and updated operating system include games, Microsoft’s Office suite, the Flipboard news aggregator and “content blockers.”

headline.main: Find Out What Apple’s New iPhones and iOS Can Do
headline.print_headline: Some Tools to Use on Those New iPhones

snippet: Apps for the new devices and updated operating system include games, Microsoft’s Office suite, the Flipboard news aggregator and “content blockers.”
